IBBox2
struct
IBBox2

Defines a integer axis-aligned bounding box (in 2D)

Members
Point2 p1

Minimum point defining one coroner of the bbox

Point2 p2

Maximum point defining one coroner of the bbox

Header

Base/Math/IBBox.h

Bounding box to construct from

Returns

Returns true if bbox is empty. False otherwise.

const Point2& p
)

Test if a specified point is inside the bounding box

PointInside
bool PointInside(
const Point2& p,
int32 tolerance
)

Test if a specified point within some specified tolerance is inside the bounding box

Parameters
p
const Point2&

Point to test

tolerance
int32

amount to expand bounding box by for test purposes

Returns

Returns true if point is inside bounding box. False otherwise.

Normalize
void Normalize()

Adjusts the coordinates of the bbox such that the minimum X and Y are in p1 and the maximum X and Y are in coordinate p2

Intersection

IBBox2& bbox,
IBBox2* pResult
)

Computes the intersection of two bounding boxes

Parameters
bbox
IBBox2&

Bounding box to intersect against

result

Returns the resulting bbox intersection

Returns

Returns true if bounding boxes intersect. False otherwise.

Point2& _p1,

)

Determines whether the specified line intersects the bounding box.

Parameters

Point2&

first point of line segment to test against
